item.title: Retarted
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

// top in context menu
outStream.writeString(“Trade with”);
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(2);
outStream.writeByteA(0);
outStream.writeString(“Duel”); <--------
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(3);
outStream.writeByteA(0);
outStream.writeString(“Attack”);
outStream.endFrameVarSize();

i fixed it i delted just this part look upthere

and it had no errors i look it says
walk here attack trade trade the one trades the other dules help!

item.title: Retarted
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

ok well i deleted right clikc dueling

// add player commands…
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(1); // command slot
outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on
// top in context menu
outStream.writeString(“Trade with”);
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(2);
outStream.writeByteA(0);

	outStream.writeString("Attack");
	outStream.endFrameVarSize();

now! when i right clikc and hit attack its sends a duel request helP!!!
